description: remove a server to the ServiceGroup as a member
name: del_slb_service_group_member

appliance.description: The appliance information to connect, which is specified at the 'appliance' parameter in the configuration.

server_name.description: the name of server to remove

server_port.description: the port-number of server to remove

service_group_name.description: the ServiceGroup name that has the member to be removed
